data.trans: Gian (nhà)/ khu vực để đỗ xe, phần nhà trồi ra
data.trans_hint: Du khách phải đỗ xe ở khu vực đỗ đã đánh dấu.
data.en_hint: Visitors must park their cars in the marked bays.
data.content_game_1: Visitors must park their cars in the marked bays.
data.answer_en_hint: Visitors must park their cars in the marked bays.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi nhìn thấy một con cá voi bị mắc cạn
data.content_game_1: We saw a beached whale
data.answer_en_hint: We saw a beached whale

data.trans_hint: Ở trong hang rất tối và lạnh.
data.en_hint: It was very dark and cold inside the cave.
data.content_game_1: It was very dark and cold inside the cave.
data.answer_en_hint: It was very dark and cold inside the cave.

data.trans_hint: Họ bị lạc trong hoang mạc 9 ngày.
data.en_hint: They were lost in the desert for nine days.
data.content_game_1: They were lost in the desert for nine days.
data.answer_en_hint: They were lost in the desert for nine days.

data.en_hint: Hill is not as high as ​mountain.
data.content_game_1: hill is not as high as ​mountain.
data.answer_en_hint: hill is not as high as ​mountain.

data.trans_hint: Họ sống trên một hòn đảo lớn, có một cây cầu nối liền nó với đất liền.
data.en_hint: They live on a large island, there's a bridge linking it with the mainland.
data.content_game_1: They live on a large island, there's a bridge linking it with the mainland.
data.answer_en_hint: They live on a large island, there's a bridge linking it with the mainland.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi thường hay đi thuyền trên hồ đó.
data.en_hint: We used to go sailing on that lake.
data.content_game_1: We used to go sailing on that lake.
data.answer_en_hint: We used to go sailing on that lake.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy có một núi công việc phải làm
data.en_hint: He has a mountain of work to do
data.content_game_1: He has a mountain of work to do
data.answer_en_hint: He has a mountain of work to do

data.trans_hint: Nhiều sinh vật bí ẩn sống dưới lòng đại dương.
data.en_hint: These mysterious creatures live at the bottom of the ocean.
data.content_game_1: These mysterious creatures live at the bottom of the ocean.
data.answer_en_hint: These mysterious creatures live at the bottom of the ocean.

data.trans_hint: Những dòng mồ hôi chảy đầm đìa trên lưng anh ấy.
data.en_hint: Rivers of sweat ran down his back.
data.content_game_1: rivers of sweat ran down his back.
data.answer_en_hint: rivers of sweat ran down his back.
